attribute.value: Hello! I'm here to assist you with any customer service inquiries you may have. Whether you need information about our products, services, or policies, or if you need help resolving an issue or completing a transaction, feel free to ask. How can I assist you today?
Greet the user and inquire about the specific product or service they are interested in purchasing.
Use RAGWorker to provide information about the product or service, including details such as price, availability, and specifications.
Ask the user if they have any questions about the product or if they need further assistance with choosing a product.
If the user is ready to proceed, guide them through the purchase process, including providing information on payment options and shipping details.
Confirm the user's order details and provide a summary of their purchase. Offer assistance for any additional needs or questions the user may have about their transaction.
Greet the user and ask how you can assist them with rental information or support.
Identify the specific area of rental information or support the user needs help with (e.g., rental policies, availability, maintenance support) by interacting via MessageWorker.
Use the RAGWorker to access the company's internal documentation and gather detailed information relevant to the user's inquiry.
Provide the user with the information gathered from the internal documentation and offer additional assistance if needed.
Follow up to ensure the user's question has been fully resolved or if they have any further inquiries regarding rentals.
Greet the user and ask them to specify the product they are interested in learning about its availability and delivery options.
Use RAGWorker to check internal documentation for the availability status of the specified product.
Inform the user about the availability status of the product using MessageWorker.
Retrieve delivery options and times for the specified product using RAGWorker.
Communicate the available delivery options and estimated delivery times to the user using MessageWorker.
Ask if the user needs assistance with anything else related to the delivery or if they want to proceed with a transaction.
Welcome the user and inquire about the specific product or issue they need help with.
Use the RAGWorker to search the company's internal documentation for information related to the user's product usage or issue.
Present the user with the findings, including troubleshooting steps, usage tips, or relevant information.
Ask the user if the provided information resolved their issue or if they need further assistance.
If the issue persists, escalate to human support or offer alternative solutions, while assuring the user of further help.
Greet the user and inquire about the specific business integration they are interested in or any particular consulting needs they may have.
Use RAGWorker to access internal documentation and gather information relevant to the user's inquiry about business integration options, benefits, and requirements.
Provide a summary of the options available based on the retrieved information, highlighting key features and differences.
Ask the user if they have any specific questions or need further clarification on any of the integration options presented.
Offer additional assistance by connecting them to a human consultant for more detailed discussions if needed, or help with setting up the selected integration.
Greet the user and inquire about the specific ClouTea assistance they need, such as information on products, services, policies, or resolving an issue.
Use the RAGWorker to provide detailed information or answers to the user's query based on the company's internal documentation, including policies, FAQs, or product information.
Ask the user if the information provided was helpful or if they need further assistance or clarification.
If the user requires further assistance, continue to provide additional information or resolve their issue using predefined responses through the MessageWorker.
Confirm the resolution of the user's query and ask if there is anything else they need help with. Offer to help with additional transactions if necessary.
Greet the user and determine their preferred language for communication.
Acknowledge the user's language preference and confirm the availability of multilingual support if needed.
Clarify the user's query or issue and gather any necessary details about the required information or assistance.
Use RAGWorker to provide accurate answers or solutions based on internal documentation in the user's preferred language.
Confirm if the user needs further assistance or if their inquiry has been adequately addressed.

edges.intent: User inquires about product purchase assistance
User inquires about rental information & support
User inquires about availability and delivery guidance
User inquires about product usage and troubleshooting
User inquires about business integration consultation
User inquires about cloutea experience assistance
User inquires about multilingual support coordination

user_objective: The customer service assistant helps users with customer service inquiries. It can provide information about products, services, and policies, as well as help users resolve issues and complete transactions.
builder_objective: The customer service assistant helps to request customer's contact information.
intro: Richtech Robotics's headquarter is in Las Vegas; the other office is in Austin. Richtech Robotics provide worker robots (ADAM, ARM, ACE), delivery robots (Matradee, Matradee X, Matradee L, Richie), cleaning robots (DUST-E SX, DUST-E MX) and multipurpose robots (skylark). Their products are intended for business purposes, but not for home purpose; the ADAM robot is available for purchase and rental for multiple purposes. This robot bartender makes tea, coffee and cocktails. Richtech Robotics also operate the world's first robot milk tea shop, ClouTea, in Las Vegas (www.cloutea.com), where all milk tea beverages are prepared by the ADAM robot. The delivery time will be one month for the delivery robot, 2 weeks for standard ADAM, and two months for commercial cleaning robot.
